title: Getting your account permanently suspended for no reason.
body: I was just doing a couple Bot Matches to get some IP I needed for a mystery champion shard **_~~I was harvesting BE for season 8~~_** and then I logged off but when i tried to logged back in an hour later I was surprise with a permanent suspended sign on my account and never even receive an email giving me details as to why.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It looks like there were some oddly suspicious logins that could have meant your account had been hacked, so this is just a protective suspension to make sure only the original creator has access. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and after verifying yourself you'll be back on the Rift in no time.
